about-us-description-title:
Alexander Dovzhenko cultural
 and educational center
about-us-description: Located in the city of Lviv, in the residential area of Sykhiv, and is one of the largest film and concert centers in Western Ukraine. Concerts, film screenings, performances, festivals, conferences, competitions and creative evenings are organized for the visitors of the institution, as well as it has a coworking area.
footer-supportedBy: Site was created with the support of UCF
